title: 2021 Propain Hugene 29er all-mountain bike gets longer, slacker and bigger on travel
content:
Propain have overhauled the Hugene all-mountain bike for 2021, adding reach, travel and slackening off the head angle considerably. The 2021 Propain Hugene is carbon only, running 29″ wheels on a 140mm travel frame with the option to run either a 140mm or 150mm fork. Pricing starts at â‚¬3,399. Let’s take a closer look. 2021 […]

author: Jessie-May Morgan
